title: Lightning Bolt
lyrics: Lightning in the sky, could it be a sign?
Devil on her knees, reach for the divine
I'll do anything, lay me to my rest
You don't need to hide my friend, for I am just like you
Well lightning strikes when you least expect
Save me from myself, can't see the end
Idol is a bitch, in me - no friend
That shooting star was missed, as I looked back
Falling from disgrace in the attack
